juju_paperweight.name: Ancestral Paperweight
juju_paperweight.description: An ancient decorative weight of uncanny beauty and density, this relic is used by the Juju Bandits to secure the bounty of their traditional paper hunts.

contraband.name: Contraband
contraband.description: This is a surprisingly light package of *something* given to you by a smuggler who might ask you to take it from one place to another for reasons you cannot fully grasp. Still, a job's a job, right? What business is it of yours what's in the package. It DOES smell familiar, thoughâ€¦

juju_trowel.name: Juju Trowel
juju_trowel.description: A rustic trowel fashioned by Juju Bandits for delicate digging in the dense savanna dirt.

note_hint.name: Secret Juju Hint
note_hint.description: If you can decipher this clue, it might lead you somewhere interesting.

small_worthless.name: Small shiny object with no intrinsic value
small_worthless.description: Shiny, but you can barely see the shine so it ends up a little dull. Totally worthless: it has no purpose. Holding on to this little object simply cannot be recommended.

user_made_quest.name: A quest made by a user
user_made_quest.description: Someone needs a job done and you look like just the person to do it. Get it done for them and you'll be rewarded.
